hero.name: Thomas Grandjean
hero.title: Ophthalmic Assistant | Clinical Data Analysis Support & Research

about.title: About
about.intro: Rigorous professional with over 10 years of experience in ophthalmology at renowned private clinics and practices in France and Canada. My goal is to leverage my optometry expertise to contribute to clinical research through data analysis.
about.description: Curious and constantly seeking improvement, I enjoy taking on new challenges, optimizing protocols, and providing technical support for data analysis to enhance patient care and clinical outcomes exploitation.

roles.title: Clinical Data Analysis Support
roles.description: Statistical analysis support for clinical data exploitation. Technical specifications writing and functional prototype design using Agile SCRUM methodology, in collaboration with clinical affairs manager and statistician.

roles.title: Fullstack Developer
roles.description: Development of analysis tool prototype using modern web technologies. Integration of ophthalmology business needs into the user interface.

roles.title: Senior Optometrist
roles.description: Technical lead for imaging department. Optimization of OCT and retinal photography acquisition protocols. Advanced training of staff on new equipment.

roles.title: Optometrist
roles.description: Pre-consultation and complex refraction. Biometry for cataract surgery. Screening and follow-up of ocular pathologies (AMD, glaucoma, diabetic retinopathy).

roles.title: Assistant Optometrist
roles.description: Technical platform proficiency. Complementary examinations (visual field, corneal topography). Assistance in specialized consultations.

roles.title: Lead Technician - Clinical Research
roles.description: Coordination of multicenter clinical study on ICL implants. Implant order management and development of personalized patient care protocols. Training of junior technicians.

roles.title: Senior Operating Room Technician
roles.description: Surgical assistance in refractive surgery (LASIK, PRK) and advanced cataract. Post-operative follow-up of glaucoma patients. Optimization of operating room safety protocols.

roles.title: Ophthalmic Assistant
roles.description: Preliminary examinations (refraction, keratometry, pachymetry). Patient preparation for surgery. Training on imaging and diagnostic equipment.

roles.title: Senior Optician
roles.description: Technical platform management for Paris store. Training of new opticians. Customer journey optimization and retention.

roles.title: Optician
roles.description: Optical equipment consulting and sales. Eye examinations and basic refraction. Insurance management and frame adjustments.
